cause.description:
The Minimum Wage is the lowest hourly wage that employers may legally pay to employees or workers. Its goal is to serve as a protection for workers from exploitation, and to ensure they are paid a living wage. Sadly, the value of Minimum Wage within the United States has been in steady decline since 1968. As the value decreases, its function as a safeguard against social inequity begins to fail. Steps must be taken to remedy this injustice. Studies, including one conducted by David Card and Alan Krueger of Princeton University, have concluded that any adverse affects the critics claim will occur due to raising minimum wage are frivolous. So, in summary, the depreciation of the value of the Minimum Wage is social injustice, and an attack on the rights of the working poor. The ill affects of raising the Minimum Wage are negligible. There are truly only benefits for the nation to come from a raise.
1. The Minimum Wage is an essential safe guard against social injustice
2. The decline in value of the Minimum Wage is an attack on human rights.
3. Action must be taken to raise the Minimum Wage
cause.mission: Raise the Minimum Wage, thereby restoring its value and allowing it to ensure social justice, as is it's purpose
cause.name: Raise The Minimum Wage!
